org.liris.smartgov.lez.core.copert.tableParser

Class SubTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>
        • org.liris.smartgov.lez.core.copert.tableParser.SubTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>

    public class SubTable
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>
    Utility class that represents a sub-part of a Copert parameters table. Data are stored as an HashMap :
    • keys : column names
    • values : column data, stored as a String ArrayList
    Author:
    pbreugnot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • max

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> max()
        Compute the maximum value of each column and return results as an HashMap. If a column contains a value that is not a Double, all the column is ignored, but valid columns are still returned.
        • keys : column names
        • values : column maximum value
        WARNING : Should be used with extra caution, because aggregating Copert parameters between different pollutant doesn't make any sense. TODO : Fix this programmatically.
        Returns:
        Sub table maximum values

      • min

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> min()
        Compute the minimum value of each column and return results as an HashMap. If a column contains a value that is not a Double, all the column is ignored, but valid columns are still returned.
        • keys : column names
        • values : column minimum value
        WARNING : Should be used with extra caution, because aggregating Copert parameters between different pollutant doesn't make any sense. TODO : Fix this programmatically.
        Returns:
        Sub table minimum values
